The study reveals how data traits shape language model generalization. 🧠💡 #AIResearch #LanguageModels
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2412.04619
Models trained on complex data 🧠 generalize better to OOD data, but unstable training dynamics occur when mixing complex and simple structures. #AIResearch #MachineLearning
Researchers find that stable OOD generalization needs consistent rules, leading to unstable training with diverse data. 🧠🤖 #AIResearch
Drum roll 🥁 The paper shows data diversity improves model generalization. #AIResearch #DataScience
